summary: Model, Susan Coffey is now the loading screen for skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[heading][center][size=40][font="Impact"][color=#6D2CDE]Official Susan Coffey Loading Screens[/color][/font][/size][/center][/heading]
[size=4][center]Info[/center][/size]
[list][size=6][font="Lithos Pro Regular"]
[*]23 Different Custom Screens
[*]Completely Standalone (no required mods)
[*]All Images are 1080p +
[/font][/size][/list]
[line]
[size=4][center]Example In Game[/center][/size]
[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/8408864-1406055427.jpg[/img][/center]
[line]
[size=4][center]Video[/center][/size]
[center][youtube]fbivVjnLzU4&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/center]
[line]
[size=4][center]Installation/Thanks[/center][/size]
[center][size=3]To install, just download with the NMM, then Activate it. If you don't have the NMM follow the included Readme.
I also want to thank Ross from CCG Models for Helping me out, couldn't have done it without his help.[/size][/center]
[line]
[center][size=6][font="Arial Black"]Links[/font][/size][/center]
[center][size=6]Here are all the Photographers sites. Please feel free to give them a like[color=yellow] :)[/color][/size][/center]
